.. :changelog:

History
-------

0.1.2 (2013-10-15)
++++++++++++++++++

* NBFIX section is now parsed. So the results for molecules with NBFIX parameters
such as cholesterol, match better between NAMD and GROMACS.


0.1.1 (2013-10-02)
++++++++++++++++++

* Updates to Readme and License.

0.1.0 (2013-09-25)
++++++++++++++++++

* First release on PyPI.
